languages.text: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} restores {uip|Wounds|4dff23a7cc4d430b91bfa8b1b5cfc20d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} each round when the wearer has any number of the following damage-over-time effects: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. Base armour property: +10% armour against non-Drukhari enemies.

traits.locale_text: This armour restores (Toughness bonus / 2) wounds each round when the wielder has any of or several damage-over-time conditions (burning, toxin, bleeding). Base armour property: +10% Armour against non-drukhari enemy.

languages.text: 当装备者受到持续伤害效果影响时（包括{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}伤害），此{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}每轮都为装备者恢复{uip|Wounds|4dff23a7cc4d430b91bfa8b1b5cfc20d}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 基础护甲特性：对抗非黑暗灵族类敌人时，获得+10%护甲。

traits.locale_text: 当装备者受到持续伤害效果影响时（包括{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}伤害），此{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}每轮都为装备者恢复{uip|Wounds|4dff23a7cc4d430b91bfa8b1b5cfc20d}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 基础护甲特性：对抗非黑暗灵族类敌人时，获得+10%护甲。

当装备者受到持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果影响时（包括{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}伤害），此{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都会为装备者恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Wounds|4dff23a7cc4d430b91bfa8b1b5cfc20d}。 基础护甲特性：对抗非黑暗灵族类敌人时，获得+10%护甲。

languages.text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} regeneriert {uip|Wounds|4dff23a7cc4d430b91bfa8b1b5cfc20d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} pro Runde, wenn der Träger einen der folgenden Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte hat: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +10 % Rüstung gegen Feinde, die keine Drukhari sind.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}は、1ラウンドごとに{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を{uip|Wounds|4dff23a7cc4d430b91bfa8b1b5cfc20d}修復する。これは使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}のうちいずれかの、時間の経過によって受けるダメージを負っている状態の場合に限られる。 基本アーマー特性：非デュカーリの敵に対してアーマー +10%

languages.text: Этот доспех восстанавливает {uip|Wounds|4dff23a7cc4d430b91bfa8b1b5cfc20d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} каждый раунд, если на персонажа действует какой-либо из перечисленных эффектов периодического урона: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}. Базовое свойство: +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против атак любых врагов, кроме друкари.

languages.text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, her rauntta giyen kişide zamanla hasar veren şu etkiler varsa {uip|Wounds|4dff23a7cc4d430b91bfa8b1b5cfc20d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tazeler: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}.
